scenes.background: [Bob] raises concerns about your decision affecting the team.
scenes.description: Monica sighs and leans back in her chair. 'Do you really think we can rely on you for future projects?'

options.text: I understand your concern. Let's establish clearer communication channels so this doesn't happen again.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and emotional perception, but empathy could be improved by addressing the immediate concern more directly.

options.text: I apologize if my absence caused issues. I can commit to being more accessible, even on leave.
options.analysis: You show good empathy and social skills by offering to be more available, but your self-regulation might suffer from overcommitment.

options.text: I think this highlights the need for better planning. Perhaps we can set up a better support system for when team members are on leave.
options.analysis: You suggest a practical solution, showing good social skills and self-regulation, but emotional perception and motivation could be higher.
